annotations:
FROM: ARYACORP PVT. LTD.
DATE & TIME: 28-08-2024 11:05:45   (GMT +5:30)
REFERΕNCE NO: 17754892
ATTN CHARTERING DESK
DEAR SIR
GOOD DAY
DIRECT OWNERS VESSEL
PLEASE ADVISE SUITABLE CARGO FOR BELOW VESSEL
MV THOR INDEPENDENCE - SMX - EXDD HUANGPU O/A - 4 - 5 SEP
MV THOR MERCURY  - SMX - OPEN DURBAN - 2  SEP
MV THOR INDEPENDENCE
SINGAPORE FLAG BLT 01
SDBC
52,407 SDWT ON 12.02 M TPC 55.5
5 HOLDS / 5 HATCHES
GRAIN/BALE 67,756/65,600
GRD 4 X 30 MTC
GRAB 4 X 12 CBM
LOA/BM 189.99 / 32.26 M
GRT/NRT 30,303/17,734
PNI: WOE
CLASS: NK
ECO SPEED
B/L ABT 12.5/12.0 KTS ON ABT 23.0/23.0 MTS VLFO
IN PORT IDLE: ABT 2.5 MTS VLFO + ABT 0.1 MTS LMG
WRKG: ABT 4.0 MTS VLFO + ABT 0.2 MTS LMG
FULL SPEED GIVEN IN GOOD FAITH BUT WOG
B/L ABT 13.7/13.2 KTS ON ABT 26.0/27.0 MTS VLFO
WITH ECO SPEED, OWNERS HAVE RIGHT FOR VESSEL TO PROCEED AT FULL
SPEED FOR 1 HOUR EVERYDAY IN ORDER TO BLOW OUT EXCESS EXHAUST/CARBON
DEPOSIT TO PREVENT EFFECTIVE DAMAGE TO MAIN ENGINE COMPONENTS
SPEED AND CONSUMPTION FIGURES ARE “ABOUT” WHICH IS APPLICABLE TO BOTH AND
JOINTLY TO SPEED AND CONSUMPTION (MEANING SPECIFICALLY 0.5 KTS FOR SPEED
AND 5% FOR CONSUMPTION), AND BOTH SPEED AND CONSUMPTION ARE ALWAYS
CALCULATED ONLY FROM BEGINNING SEA PASSAGE TO END SEA PASSAGE, EXCLUDING
ANY VOYAGE UP TO 36 HOURS DURATION, AND BOTH SPEED AND CONSUMPTION ARE
ALWAYS SUBJECT TO GOOD WEATHER CONDITIONS (24 CONSECUTIVE HOURS) OF UP TO
AND INCLUDING BEAUFORT SCALE 4 AND DOUGLAS SEA STATE 3, WITH COMBINED WAVE
AND SWELL HEIGHTS NOT TO EXCEED 1.25 M, WITHOUT ANY ADVERSE CURRENTS,
WITHOUT NEGATIVE INFLUENCE OF SWELL, BEING ON EVEN KEEL AND EXCLUDING
PERIODS DURING WHICH  REDUCTIONS OF SPEED FOR SAFETY, REDUCED VISIBILITY,
STEAMING AND/OR MANEUVERING IN CONGESTED WATERS ETC. SPEED IS NOT TO BE
DEBITED DUE TO FAVOURABLE CURRENTS.
DAYS EXCEEDING THE AGREED ABOVE MENTIONED GOOD WEATHER CONDITIONS ARE TO BE
EXPRESSLY EXCLUDED WHEN VESSEL’S SPEED EVALUATION IS CONDUCTED, NO OTHER
EXTRAPOLATION WILL BE ALLOWED. AN UNDERPERFORMANCE CLAIM CAN ONLY BE
SUBMITTED IN RESPECT OF DAYS (24 CONSECUTIVE HOURS) ON WHICH THE VESSEL
ENCOUNTERED WIND UP TO AND INCLUDING BEAUFORT SCALE 4 & DOUGLAS SEA STATE 3,
WITH COMBINED WAVE AND SWELL HEIGHTS NOT TO EXCEED 1.25 M, WITHOUT ANY
ADVERSE CURRENTS, WITHOUT NEGATIVE INFLUENCE OF SWELL. ALWAYS SUBJECT TO
GOOD QUALITY OF BUNKERS AS AGREED HEREIN.
THE VESSEL IS ALLOWED TO USE MDO/MGO WHEN MANEUVERING AND PASSING
NARROW / RESTRICTED / CONFINED WATER, INCLUDING WHEN THE VESSEL
CARRIES OUT HOLD CLEANING AND BILGE PUMPING.
BUNKERS IFO(380 CST) PARAMETERS AS PER ISO8217/2010
RMG 380 AND MDO AS PER  ISO8217/2010 - DMB
IN THE EVENT THAT CHARTERERS ORDER THE VESSEL TO PORT(S) OR AREA(S) WHERE
THE VESSEL STAY IS PROLONGED, IE 20 DAYS OR MORE IN A TROPICAL AND/OR
SEASONAL TROPICAL WATERS, IN PORT OR AT BERTH OR AT ANCHORAGE OR
DRIFTING OR ANY MOVEMENTS THAT LESS THAN 8 HRS FULL SPEED, OR 25 DAYS OR
MORE IN ANY OTHER WORLDWIDE AREA OR LAY-UP, IN SUCH CASE, UNDERWATER
CLEANING OF HULL INCLUDING PROPELLER ETC, TO BE DONE AT FIRST WORKABLE
OPPORTUNITY AND ALWAYS AT CHARTERERS' TIME AND EXPENSE. IN CASE HULL
BEEN FOULED DURING LADEN CONDITION BUT UNDERWATER HULL CLEANING ARRANGE AT
BALLAST CONDITION, CHTRS TO CLEAN ALL FOULED AREAS INCLUDING AREA ABOVE
WATERLINE, ALWAYS AT CHARTERERS' TIME AND EXPENSE. ALL HULL CLEANING TO
BE DONE UPTO OWNERS AND/OR MASTER'S APPROVAL/SATISFACTION BUT NOT LIMIT TO
USE OF CCTV, CLASS APPROVED CLEANING COMPANY, NOT TO DAMAGE HULL PAINTING
AND CHTRS TO PROVIDE FULL HULL CLEANING REPORT WITH PHOTOS/VIDEOS.
THEREAFTER HULL CLEANING VESSEL'S PERFORMANCE WARRANTIES TO BE REINSTATED.
ALTERNATIVELY, IF IT IS APPROXIMATELY ESTIMATED THAT VESSEL’S STAY
WILL MEET ANY OF THE TWO AFOREMENTIONED PERIODS, OWNERS HAVE THE RIGHT
TO TAKE 8-HOURS FULL SPEED FOULING PREVENTION NAVIGATION WITHIN THE
AREA, AT CHARTERERS' TIME, EXPENSE AND ARRANGEMENTS. ONLY UPON
COMPLETION OF SUCCESSFUL ANTI-FOULING NAVIGATION, SPEED AND
CONSUMPTION WARRANTIES TO BE REINSTATED.
IN ANY CASE(S), UNDERWATER CLEANING OF HULL INCLUDING PROPELLER ETC,
MUST BE PERFORMED LATEST PRIOR VESSEL’S REDELIVERY OTHERWISE OWNERS
ARE ENTITLED TO ALL DAMAGES ARISING FROM CHARTERERS’ BREACH OF THE CP,
INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO HULL CLEANING, OFF-HIRE DURING CLEANING,
PORT EXPENSES, BUNKERS AND POTENTIAL UNDERPERFORMANCE AND
OVER-CONSUMPTION CLAIM FROM NEXT CHARTERERS.
OWNERS  : THORESEN SHIPPING SINGAPORE PTE LTD.
MANAGERS: THORESEN & CO., (BANGKOK) LTD.
(ALL DETS ABT)
MV THOR MERCURY
SINGAPORE FLAG BLT 05
SDBC
55,862 SDWT ON 12.52 M TPC 56.1
5 HOLDS / 5 HATCHES
GRAIN/BALE 69,450/66,368
GRD 4 X 30.5 MTC
GRAB 4 X 12 CBM
LOA/BM 189.90 / 32.26 M
GT/NT 30,822 / 18,103
PNI: BRITANNIA
CLASS: ABS
ECO SPEED
B/L ABT 12.0/11.5 KTS ON ABT 21.0/21.0 MTS VLFO
IN PORT IDLE: ABT 2.5 MTS VLFO + ABT 0.1 MTS LMG
WRKG: ABT 4.5 MTS VLFO + ABT 0.2 MTS LMG
FULL SPEED GIVEN IN GOOD FAITH BUT WOG
B/L ABT 13.6/13.1 KTS ON ABT 26.0/26.5 MTS VLFO

OWNERS  : THORESEN SHIPPING SINGAPORE PTE LTD.
MANAGERS: THORESEN & CO., (BANGKOK) LTD.
(ALL DETS ABT)
PLSD TO HEAR.
BEST REGARDS,
